name: Cardo [1]
description: The double-handed pistol made in the reduced proportion of the pillars in ancient shrines.

name: Cardo [2]
description: The double-handed pistol made in the reduced proportion of the pillars in ancient shrines.

name: Carga Mace [2]
description: A heavy scepter with a sharp blade. In the language of Wood Gaint, Calgar means "shouting".

name: Carga Mace [3]
description: In the language of the Wood Giant, Carga means "shout". This is a heavy staff with a sharp blade.

name: Carrot
description: A red vegetable that tastes sweet and is often served as a dish. It can restore 18-20 points of HP.

name: Carrot Juice
description: Juice squeezed from carrots. It can restore 27-33 points of HP, and the effect is faster than that of direct eating.

name: Cat Bar Pack
description: Open it to receive lots of consumables for GVG

name: Cat Club [2]
description: A cute stick in the shape of a cat claw.

name: Cat Club [3]
description: A cute stick in the shape of a cat claw.

name: Cat Ear Beret
description: Cute beret hat with cat ears.

name: Cat Ear Beret [1]
description: Cute beret hat with cat ears.

name: Cat Ear Beret [1] Blueprint
description: Cute beret hat with cat ears.

name: Cat Ear Pudding Coco
description: Made for the kitty who love sports, light and chill! Mr. Coffee designed with the softest materials. The hat is like a Pudding, this one is cool black.

name: Cat Ear Pudding SugarFrost
description: Made for the kitty who love sports, light and chill! Mr. Coffee designed with the softest materials. The hat is like a Pudding, this one is soft white.

name: Cat Grass
description: Economic crops that have recently been popular in Comet. Cats believe that carrying them will be good luck. (It is rumored that Miu on Vacation is collecting this somewhere. It may be a good idea to give it to her, but where is she taking a vacation?)

name: Cat Marshmallow
description: Autumn has come. Is winter far away? Soft cotton candy earmuffs bring the warmth like first love... [Author: Yuan Xiao Mao]

name: Cat Picnic Pad
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of Flower Sea. Even cats cannot resist the comfort of lying on it.

name: Cat Toy [1]
description: A prop that makes the cat happy. Misusing it may irritate cats.
